options: ['Donna and Liza', 'Rita and Donna', 'Liza and Rita', 'Donna, Liza and Rita']
article: My name is Donna and I have two sisters, Liza and Rita. We like hamburgers and milk for lunch. Lisa and I like chicken, but Rita doesn't. I don't like noodles  for breakfast, but Liza and Rita do. I like porridge  for breakfast. We really like vegetables and eggs for dinner.
